property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. −3: Target creature gains flying and double strike until end of turn. −8: Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens, where X is your life total.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 white Cat creature token. If that enchantment is an Aura, you may attach it to the token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each end step, if you gained 4 or more life this turn, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As demons are drawn to suffering, angels are drawn to acts of benevolence.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The air stirred as if fanned by angels' wings, and the enemy was turned aside." - Tales of Ikarov the Voyager

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Banisher Priest enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Banisher Priest leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature {W}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Virtue can't survive without strength." - Ardanna of the Angelic Council

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sliver creatures you control have double strike. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their appendages are sharper than our swords and quicker than our bows." - Hastric, Thunian scout

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a color. White creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) {1}{W}: Capashen Knight gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He protects Benalia as much with his reputation as with his force of arms.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player sacrifices an attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You were defeated the moment you declared your aggression." - Gideon Jura

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Charging Griffin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Four claws, two wings, one beak, no fear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the gathering there is strength for all who founder, renewal for all who languish, love for all who sing." - Song of All, canto 642

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She crushes darkness beneath her charger's hooves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying for each creature tapped this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A prayer to bring demons to their knees.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Divine Favor enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With an armory of light, even the squire may champion her people.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) Fiendslayer Paladin can't be the target of black or red spells your opponents control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. • Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where metal is tainted and wood is scarce, we are best armed by faith." - Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a griffin sentinel adopts a territory as its own, only death can force it to betray its post.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 colorless Sliver creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sliver young are sorted into clutches according to their potential and their future role. Human scholars can only guess how those are determined.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some are born to rule. The rest are born to bow before them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant permanent Enchanted permanent has indestructible. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy that permanent. A creature with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Master of Diversion attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Choose your battles carefully. For example, avoid the big guy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as your life total is greater than or equal to your starting life total, creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, you gain life equal to the number of attacking creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Out of this nettle, danger, we pluck this flower, safety." - William Shakespeare, King Henry IV, Part I

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You old, immobile clod! If I could stuff your doltish head with knowledge, I'd do it just so someone else could fully comprehend what your stubbornness has cost me!" - Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sliver creatures you control have vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Through its watchful gaze, all slivers may see.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Seraph of the Sword.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only when my sword lies idle shall I rejoice."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The walls of the wicked will fall before us. Ready the siege engines. We proceed to war!" - General Avitora

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponents can't cast spells this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take a quiet moment to reflect on your sins." - Cleph, Order of Redeemed Souls

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You will be reimbursed for your donation.""The reimbursement is spiritual." - Temple signs

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Healing is more art than magic. Well, there is still quite a bit of magic."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Though the slivers may sometimes resemble us, they are not human. Anyone who fights them must remember this." - Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}{W}: Stonehorn Chanter gains vigilance and lifelink until end of turn. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap. Damage dealt by it also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With the Stonehorn, piety and power are one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are the finest companions in the realm. Swift, clever, and easily trained to hunt intruders." - Almira, falconer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When I said we needed more swords to protect the realm, this was not quite what I had in mind." - Olander, tactician of the Northern Verge

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}{U}: Tap target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wind is forceful, yet ephemeral. It can knock a dragon out of the sky, yet pass through the smallest crack unhindered." - Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Words of power never disappear. They sleep, awaiting those with the will to rouse them."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Creatures displaced from time still turn up every year, stranded by the temporal disaster that once swept across Dominaria.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Six feet of earth muffled his cries.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He knows your strengths, your weaknesses, and the shape of that unfortunate birthmark on your backside.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Whenever Colossal Whale attacks, you may exile target creature defending player controls until Colossal Whale leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Early sailors thought they were tricks of the mind or perhaps manatees. As more and more ships were classified as lost to "manatee attacks," the truth began to dawn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature your opponents control is an Illusion in addition to its other types and has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You trust in the shadows of a breeze." - Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gryffid found his way home and resumed life as best he could, constantly hiding his newfound fear of clouds.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you." - Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. At the beginning of your end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, sacrifice Domestication.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Elite Arcanist enters the battlefield, you may exile an instant card from your hand. {X}, {T}: Copy the exiled card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. X is the mana value of the exiled card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What you attempt to pull from the Æther, I can spread onto the wind." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll make ice chimes of your bones."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sliver creatures you control have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Masters of adaptation, galeriders serve multiple purposes useful to the hive. When they're not patrolling their territories, their majestic wings serve to circulate cool air through the vast hive chambers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No simple coin toss can solve this riddle. You must think and choose wisely." - Shai Fusan, archmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +4/+4. When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice Illusionary Armor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Draw a card. Target player mills a card. [0]: Target player mills ten cards. −7: Any number of target players each draw twenty cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Jace's Mindseeker enters the battlefield, target opponent mills five cards. You may cast an instant or sorcery spell from among them without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Whenever Merfolk Spy deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals a card at random from their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Messenger Drake dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The more important the message, the larger the messenger.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Keep one eye on the cliff road or you may fall to your death. Keep one eye on the sky or your death may fall on you." - Manfried Ulmach, Elgaud Master-at-Arms

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Opportunity isn't something you wait for. It's something you create."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The construction of a defense is not accomplished by adding bricks." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next sorcery spell you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash. (It can be cast any time you could cast an instant.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A skilled Izzet chronarch can carry out an epic vendetta between the fall of one hourglass grain and the next.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kapsho merfolk have infiltrated fortresses as remote as the desert citadel in Sunari in their relentless quest for arcane knowledge.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Seacoast drakes have been known to follow ships for hundreds of miles, waiting to snap up garbage, bait, and the occasional sailor.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They call it "stitcher's anesthesia," a spell to deaden the senses while the mad doctors begin their grisly work.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell with mana value X. (For example, if that spell's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}, X is 5.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Perhaps you could try throwing a rock? That might be better suited to your intellect."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tidebinder Mage enters the battlefield, tap target red or green creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Tidebinder Mage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yesterday you were just a figment of your master's imagination. I liked you better then." - Shai Fusan, archmage

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I hope none of those were important!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Trained Condor attacks, another target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're smart enough to understand that war means lots of carrion." - Griv, condor rider

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player mills half their library, rounded down.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He was left with just enough memory to understand what he had lost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen countless petty warmongers gaze on it for a time before turning away." - Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Creature spells with flying you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Evos Isle, the swift and formidable aven enforce the will of the ruling sphinxes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}: Water Servant gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {U}: Water Servant gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This creature has innate perceptiveness. It knows when to rise and when to vanish into the tides." - Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a creature with flying attacks, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your mind is too filled with foolish concerns to hear the subtle whispers that the breeze brings."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All armies prefer high ground to low and sunny places to dark." - Sun Tzu, Art of War, trans. Giles

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many have heard the slither of dragging armor and the soft squelch of its voice. But only its victims ever meet its icy gaze.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't worry, your death will be as informative as possible." - Gorghul, augur of skulls

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant Equipment At the beginning of your upkeep, if enchanted Equipment is attached to a creature, destroy that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some treasures aren't worth finding, let alone stealing." - Dack Fayden

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may have target creature get -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your flesh is unprepared for my gifts."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice another creature: Blood Bairn gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The travelers were warned to watch out for children on the road.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Festering Newt or Bubbling Cauldron, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hardest thing is finding the right ingredients."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{B}, Sacrifice Corpse Hauler: Return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He expects a reward, but the only piece of silver he'll get from me is my blade in his gut." - Shelac, necromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Corrupt deals damage to any target equal to the number of Swamps you control. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One misstep in the swamp and the evil that sleeps beneath will rise to find you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Dark Favor enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life. Enchanted creature gets +3/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When he began to curse what he held holy, his strength grew unrivaled.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the bog ran short on small animals, Ekri turned to the surrounding farmlands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes I come across a stone finger or foot and I know I'm in cockatrice territory." - Rulak, bog guide

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wise always keep an ear open to the whispers of power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It hurts more if you think about it." - Hooks, Cabal torturer

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Festering Newt dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn. That creature gets -4/-4 instead if you control a creature named Bogbrew Witch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its back bubbles like a witch's cauldron, and it smells just as vile.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On still nights you can hear its rotted teeth grinding tirelessly on scavenged bones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target creature card in a graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The necromancer's touch strips away memory and loyalty, and only strength and malice remain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) When Lifebane Zombie enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a green or white creature card from it and exile that card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. −3: Target creature gets +X/+X or -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Swamps you control. −6: You get an emblem with "Swamps you control have ‘{T}: Add {B}{B}{B}{B}.'"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Whenever Liliana's Reaver deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You harbor such vast potential. It would be such a shame to let you die of old age." - Zul Ashur, lich lord

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My ‘condition' is a trial. The weak are consumed by it. The strong transcend it." - Sorin Markov

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What a pity. You should have written it down." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look at that. Shuffling, wobbling, entrails placed haphazardly. It's shameful. Who would let that kind of work flap about for all to see?" - Lestin, necromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The thunder of its hooves beats dreams into despair.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{B}: Nightwing Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is one hour of the night even we do not watch." - Sedva, captain of the watch

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each Swamp you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dread gases didn't kill Farbid. But as he lay in the muck, miserable and helpless, watching ghouls and rats advance on him, he wished they had.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For every living person there are generations of dead. Which realm would you rather rule?" - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Blood is constant. Every drop I drink, someone must bleed." - Vradeen, vampire nocturnus

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A deck can have any number of cards named Shadowborn Apostle. {B}, Sacrifice six creatures named Shadowborn Apostle: Search your library for a Demon creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Shadowborn Demon enters the battlefield, destroy target non-Demon creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are fewer than six creature cards in your graveyard, sacrifice a creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not weep for the frail. Their time couldn't have been that far off." - Nathrac, plaguesower

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sliver creatures you control have lifelink. (Damage dealt by a Sliver creature you control also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the hive must feed, every appendage becomes an additional mouth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tenacious Dead dies, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Raising the bones of Hekjek the Mad proved far easier than getting them to lie back down.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The work that went into creating this magnificent specimen. Horrific, deadly, well-balanced. Not all necromancers do elegant work like this." - Lestin, necromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice another creature: Regenerate Vampire Warlord. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How can you serve me? By dying."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Grave robbers digging down cautiously listen for anything digging up.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -3/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You shouldn't be so attached to something as fragile as flesh." - Zul Ashur, lich lord

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Xathrid Necromancer or another Human creature you control dies, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My commands shall echo forever in their dusty skulls."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Whenever Academy Raider deals combat damage to a player, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison." - Sarkhan Vol

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant Mountain Enchanted Mountain is a 7/7 red Giant creature with haste. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some days you stand to greet the horizon. Other days the horizon stands to greet you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Barrage of Expendables deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblin generals don't distinguish between troops and ammunition.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One emitted a strange series of buzzing clicks and guttural commands, then clawed arms emerged from all of them. Is there no limit to their adaptations?" - Hastric, Thunian scout

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sliver creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They move in a synchronized swarm, turning entire squads into heaps of bloody rags and bones in an instant.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player taps a nonbasic land for mana, Burning Earth deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your world is formed from the same power that wraps my burning hand around your throat." - Shrazik, lavamancer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We'll scale these cliffs, traverse Brittle Bridge, and then fight our way down the volcanic slopes on the other side.""Isn't the shortest route through the canyon?""Yes.""So shouldn't we - ""No."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Chandra, Pyromaster deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to up to one target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls. That creature can't block this turn. [0]: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. −7: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Choose an instant or sorcery card exiled this way and copy it three times. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chandra never believed in using her "inside voice."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) Whenever an opponent is dealt damage by a red instant or sorcery spell you control or by a red planeswalker you control, return Chandra's Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Cyclops Tyrant can't block creatures with power 2 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single eye, blinded by rage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is why I hate settlements. They lull you into a false sense of security." - Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Dragon Egg dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragon birth lairs are littered with treasure to entice the young from their eggs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {R}: Dragon Hatchling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those dragons grow fast. For a while they feed on squirrels and goblins and then suddenly you're missing a mammoth." - Hurdek, Mazar mammoth trainer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You're in luck. I brought enough to share." - Chandra Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fleshpulper Giant enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with toughness 2 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He doesn't hate small folk. He just likes the squishing sound they make.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Each creature attacks this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you need to convey that special kind of message.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Goblin Shortcutter enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm not running away! I'm figuring out the best routes."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A strict upgrade over the cinder hatchet.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The victim was either clawed to death or struck by lightning. Possibly both." - Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Marauding Maulhorn attacks each combat if able unless you control a creature named Advocate of the Beast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's not just you. Everyone makes it angry." - Ardenoth, elvish nature advocate

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Whenever an opponent casts a white or blue instant or sorcery spell, Mindsparker deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens, then flip a coin. If you win the flip, return Molten Birth to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Few can coax the creatures within the magma to be cooled and take form." - Koth of the Hammer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ogres are driven by passion, rage, and another ogre standing behind them with a whip.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Pitchburn Devils dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ingenuity of goblins, the depravity of demons, and the smarts of sheep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It stalks the Regathan highlands, leaving behind melted snow, scorched earth, and the charred corpses of would-be temple robbers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Scourge of Valkas or another Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of Dragons you control. {R}: Scourge of Valkas gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is not in me to tread lightly." - Ryda, geomancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying. {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you see the world as a dragon sees it, everything looks fit to burn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Looks like that wasn't darksteel after all." - Koth of the Hammer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sliver creatures you control have first strike. (They deal combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You're too busy recoiling in fear to realize that it's already hit you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sliver creatures you control have "Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 1 damage to any target."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every inch of a sliver's body is a potential claw, appendage, or projectile.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The common folk call it the breaking of the crust or the spilling of fire. Geomancers call it target practice." - Ryda, geomancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may choose new targets for target instant or sorcery spell. Then copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May your day never match your expectations." - Scriptus Fleen, flectomancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Immolation is the sincerest form of flattery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on target Beast creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am neither their drover nor their leader. To these majestic beasts, I am simply their herdmate and nothing more."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature abhors a lot of things.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Briarpack Alpha enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One of my greatest teachers." - Garruk Wildspeaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Brindle Boar: You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tell the cooks to prepare the fires. Tonight we feast!" - Tolar Wolfbrother, Krosan tracker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even dragons fear its silken strands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life grows everywhere. My kin merely find those places where it grows strongest." - Nissa Revane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +7/+7 and gains trample until end of turn. It must be blocked this turn if able. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I fear no army or beast, but only the morning fog. Our assault can survive everything else." - Lord Hilneth

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. −3: You may put a green creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. −7: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may cast creature spells from the top of your library. (Do this only any time you could cast that creature spell. You still pay the spell's costs.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It has a quickness about it that seems unnatural for its large size, yet its hunger is about right." - Endril, Kalonian naturalist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The forest is my cover and I hold it close. In such a tight embrace, there is no room for wickedness."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sliver creatures you control have trample. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token for each Forest you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The murderous horrors of Raven's Run are legendary, but even that haunted place goes quiet when the night wolves howl.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wonders hide where the trees grow thickest." - Mul Daya proverb

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Kalonian Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Kalonian Hydra attacks, double the number of +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even baloths fear its feeding time.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And all this time I thought we were tracking it." - Juruk, Kalonian tracker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Victory favors neither the righteous nor the wicked. It favors the prepared.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sliver creatures you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I see in their interconnectedness a strange embodiment of the natural order." - Dionus, elvish archdruid

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the thrums, the lowliest of slivers, become deadly in its presence.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When your cities and trinkets crumble, only nature will remain." - Garruk Wildspeaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Oath of the Ancient Wood or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some gaze upon the forest and see trees. I see true power."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let nothing own the skies but the wind." - Dejara, Giltwood druid

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No matter how much the slivers change, their collective might remains.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put three +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You don't survive in the wild by standing in plain sight." - Garruk Wildspeaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}: Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They make terrible pets . . . unless you don't like your other pets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the dim light beneath the vast trees of Deepglade, baloths prowl in search of prey. Their guttural calls are more felt than heard, but their attack scream carries for miles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. The next creature spell you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash. That spell can't be countered. That creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In nature, not a single bone or scrap of flesh goes to waste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you threaten its territory, it produces spores. Actually, no matter what you do, it produces spores." - Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{1}{G}: Regenerate this creature." (The next time the creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vastwood Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. When Vastwood Hydra dies, you may distribute a number of +1/+1 counters equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on Vastwood Hydra among any number of creatures you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land When Verdant Haven enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Voracious Wurm enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the amount of life you've gained this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shepherds in Kalonia know it's better to let sheep roam than have them be trapped when the wurms are feeding.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Windstorm deals X damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We don't like interlopers and thieves cluttering our skies." - Dionus, elvish archdruid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Whenever an opponent casts a blue or black spell during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Witchstalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control eight or more lands, Woodborn Behemoth gets +4/+4 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +0/+3 and has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.) Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An Auriok shield is polished to a mirror finish even on the inside, enabling its bearer to watch foes ahead and behind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 4 life. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature named Festering Newt: Each opponent loses 4 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifacts you control have indestructible. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them. Artifact creatures with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is as if this world has been expecting our blessings." - Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this artifact.) {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It reflects the purity of Mirrodin-that-was." - Koth of the Hammer

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Door of Destinies enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen type, put a charge counter on Door of Destinies. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1 for each charge counter on Door of Destinies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bottled life. Not as tasty as I'm used to, rather stale, but it has the same effect." - Baron Sengir

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.) Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, if Guardian of the Ages has defender, it loses defender and gains trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At my feet, invasions end." - Statue inscription

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +4/+4. {0}: Until end of turn, Haunted Plate Mail becomes a 4/4 Spirit artifact creature that's no longer an Equipment. Activate only if you control no creatures. Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Minds, like mountains, are never so grand and mighty that they can't be reduced to dust.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a red instant or sorcery spell you control or a red planeswalker you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 2 to that permanent or player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An inferno is just a gesture away.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Put a charge counter on Ratchet Bomb. {T}, Sacrifice Ratchet Bomb: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Ratchet Bomb.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ring of Three Wishes enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it. {5}, {T}, Remove a wish counter from Ring of Three Wishes: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The good news is it's so simple a goblin could use it. The bad news is it's so simple a goblin could use it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Slivers destroy those who come close to the Skep, the central hive. Shards of torn metal litter the ground as a warning to any artificers inquisitive about the hive's inner workings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a black spell or a Swamp enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A symbol of ambition in ruthless times.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a red spell or a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A symbol of passion in indifferent times.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a blue spell or an Island enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A symbol of sagacity in bewildering times.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a white spell or a Plains enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A symbol of conviction in uncertain times.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a green spell or a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A symbol of ferocity in oppressive times.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Copy target triggered ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A triggered ability uses the words "when," "whenever," or "at.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its tines cannot be rung by mere physical force. Only magic of great power can start its eldritch resonance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}, Discard a card: You gain 4 life. {1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 0/1 white Goat creature token. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice Vial of Poison: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are worse ways to die, but not many.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Encroaching Wastes: Destroy target nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every world is a work in progress, constantly reshaped by time, disasters, and even the powerful magic of Planeswalkers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}: Mutavault becomes a 2/2 creature with all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some worlds possess a hidden core where life's essence constantly surges.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Untold riches await those who forsake the bustling world to search the secret, silent places.
